channel.title: paper on Konigi
channel.description: Recent content in paper on Konigi

item.title: Markup & Style Society
item.description: Distressed paper nailed to a 2x4's make up the background of this event site's blog. http://markupandstyle.org/

item.title: Tori's Eye
item.description: This is pretty cool. Origami birds carrying tweets while the sun rises on papercraft scenery. All done with jquery. http://toriseye.quodis.com/#konigi

item.title: Printable Paper Rulers
item.description: This is a pretty cool idea. A collection of rulers you can print. http://www.vendian.org/mncharity/dir3/paper_rulers/
